title: An Opera prepares: 'Eugene Onegin'
creator_credit: Bosisto Productions, Brian Bosisto, Mario Andreacchio and Lesley Hammond
brief_description: A film made for use in secondary schools, to show the work and preparation that is involved in staging an opera performance, in this case, “Eugene Onegin”. Shows both the behind-the-scenes preparations and a dress rehearsal. Features the South Australia Opera Company and music by the ABC Symphony Orchestra. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
